name: Astro Explorer IV
description:
My 3D Platformer Project. Some mods include:

  1. Changed Name
  2. Included 2 Levels
  3. Created Tutorial Level with walk through instructions on controls
  4. Heavily modified level design using assets downloaded from the Asset Store.
  5. Changed Lighting for Effect
  6. Adjusted camera angle and distance from player
  7. Added different score pickups for additional points. Changed colors of score pickups based on score value. Changed sizes. Bigger pickups = more points.

Created by: Donald Faulknor
